text: Pac-Man Battle Royale is the 17th arcade game in the Pac-Man series (11th official). It is part of the Pac-Man 30th Anniversary and developed by Namco Bandai Games. It was released for the arcade in January 2011 and later ported to Pac-Man Museum for a digital release (Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and Windows PC) in 2014. title: Pac-Man Battle Royale
